prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, Drums, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, omitting Reed.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Organ, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, Reed excluded.
